title: Guanlan Scholarship Foundation
introText: We support talented girls in rural China by providing scholarships to help them complete their education. Join us in making a difference.
aboutText: Guanlan Scholarship Foundation collaborates with grassroots NGOs in China to deliver scholarships directly to girls in need. Our work is driven by volunteers and fueled by global supporters, especially the Chinese diaspora in North America.
donateText: Your support helps cover tuition, books, and living costs. 100% of donations go directly to scholarships.
